div.p: for the department of War in Tennessee
You will receive enclosed a copy of a letter from Colonel Scott of Blount County to the Executive, and My letter addressed the Warriors and Cheifs of the Cherokee Nation on that Subject.

You will perceive by Mr. Scotts letter that some of the Cherokees have committed a very daring insult and such as cannot be passed over in Silence. You will have the goodness to cause my letter to be laid before the cheif so soon as may be conveinant, in order that their answer may be obtained as speedily as possible.
I have the honor to be Sir
Your most obed and Hbl Servt
